attributes.action: Benefit Cuts for those teens who causes Anti Social activities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prime minister needs to take some hard steps against these anti social activities. Every law abide citizen believe that government should tackle these teens fast, before this problem goes out of control. Every time any one does some anti social activity their benefits should be cut down. Its a human instinct to survive first. If they think their behavior will cost them there living, then they'll stop acting against civilized society.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
